title: kaNNeDuttAgilum kANIrO
sahitya:
kaNNeDuttAgilum kAnIrO en kAviya mAlaiyaip-pUNIrO


anupallavi

  paNNum panuvalum bharatamum viratamum bhaktiyum koNDingE nittiyam tozhum ennaik-


caraNam 1    paTTam padavi perep-pADavillai tanga padakkangaLai enrum nADavillai ayyA
eTTeTTu dikkilum Odavillai ummai idaya mOnattil anrit-tEDavillai ayyA
    caraNam 2    pErukkum pugazhukkum pErAshai paDavillai periya pEr vAlaiyum kumbiDavillai
Aruyikk-uyirAga arindummai nEsittEn Arva malargaLai aLLi aLLi pusittEn
